T1.config value: configured the tick value for Tier1 water source (default is 125)

T2.config value: configured the tick value for Tier2 water source (default is 250)

T3.config value: configured the tick value for Tier3 water source (default is 500)

T4.config value: configured the tick value for Tier4 water source (default is 1000)

T5.config value: configured the tick value for Tier5 water source (default is 2000)
